condition: [AND]([OR]([EQ](<*VALUE(Experion Server Type)*>,Server),[EQ](<*VALUE(Experion Server Type)*>,Server TPS)),[EQ](<*VALUE(Server Mounting)*>,Cabinet))
name: Show_Rack_Mount_Server
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Rack_Mount_Server,Server_NodeType,Node_Supplier_Server,TrustedPlatformModule_TPM,AdditionalHard_Disk,Optional_DVD_ServerDisk,ServerLocation_Cluster_Network_Group,Marine_Requirement_Cabinet)*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(AdditionalMemory_Server Disk)*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(AdditionalMemory_Server Disk)*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(AdditionalMemory_Server Disk)*><*SETREQUIRED(AdditionalMemory_Server Disk)*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(ServerLocation_Cluster_Network_Group:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
